about.summary: A library for reading and writing FITS files

name: cfitsio
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "cfitsio" %}
{% set version = "3.410" %}
{% set nodotversion = "3410" %}
{% set sha256 = "a556ac7ea1965545dcb4d41cfef8e4915eeb8c0faa1b52f7ff70870f8bb5734c" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}{{ nodotversion }}.tar.gz
  url: ftp://heasarc.gsfc.nasa.gov/software/fitsio/c/{{ name }}{{ nodotversion }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  detect_binary_files_with_prefix: true
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - toolchain

test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libcfitsio.a

about:
  home: http://heasarc.gsfc.nasa.gov/fitsio/fitsio.html
  license: fitsio
  license_file: License.txt
  summary: "A library for reading and writing FITS files"

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - pkgw
